alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:18PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pinal County through 700 PM MST... At 617 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eloy, or 17 miles southeast of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eloy and Picacho. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 206 and 217. Route 87 between mile markers 116 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
